function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate PPE for workers based on their specific risks, leading to insufficient protection from COVID-19 exposure","Impact":"Increased risk of contracting and spreading COVID-19 among workers","Mitigation":"Conducting individual risk assessments to determine the appropriate PPE for each worker and providing necessary training on proper usage","Technologies":"Risk assessment tools, training modules on PPE usage","People":"Workers at offshore workplaces","Owner":"Health and safety team at the company"},{"Description":"Limited facilities for self-quarantine and self-isolation, leading to challenges in preventing COVID-19 transmission among workers","Impact":"Increase in the number of COVID-19 cases and difficulty in containing outbreaks","Mitigation":"Collaborating with hotel service providers to offer isolation and quarantine rooms, seeking approval from local health authorities, and implementing alternative quarantine measures","Technologies":"Digital surveillance applications, geotagging for monitoring","People":"Workers, local health authorities, company management","Owner":"Health and safety team at the company"},{"Description":"Challenges in ensuring workers' compliance with health protocols during self-quarantine","Impact":"Risk of non-compliance leading to increased transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Proper communication of surveillance measures, addressing privacy concerns, and providing clear guidelines for self-quarantine protocols","Technologies":"Digital surveillance applications, communication platforms for guidance","People":"Workers, company management, health and safety team","Owner":"Health and safety team at the company"}]}
